1.text: Paper 'Urban Mosaic: Visual Exploration of Streetscapes Using Large-Scale Image Data ' accepted to CHI 2020!

2.text: Paper 'Learning Geo-Contextual Embeddings for Commuting Flow Prediction' accepted to AAAI 2020!

4.text: SIGMOD 2018 Best Demonstration Award for the paper 'Interactive Visual Exploration of Spatio-Temporal Urban Data Sets using Urbane'

5.text: Pearl Brownstein Doctoral Research Award: Doctoral research that shows the greatest promise, given by NYU Tandon School of Engineering, in 2018.

7.text: Urban Pulse featured on Architectural Digest.

9.text: Urban Pulse code is now available on github, with a new web interface.

10.text: Shadow project featured on The New York Times (and later featured on several websites).

11.text: Urban Pulse featured on The Economist.
